title: FELLINI SAYS... a documentary by Bruno Mattei (Italian audio)

sources.title: FELLINI SAYS... a documentary by Bruno Mattei (Italian audio)
sources.description:
Explore Fellini's artistic world as a limitless workshop packed with unique characters, creating an engaging and intriguing space within the film universe. "Fellini Dice" aims to incorporate previously unreleased material into the episodes, offered in a triptych, to provide both entertainment and a fresh angle for critically analyzing Fellini's cinematic legacy, and homage to this great master of the cinema.

Original Title: Fellini Dice... AKA: Fellini Says (2004)

Director: Bruno Mattei 
Producers: Faso Film, La Perla Nera 
Cast: 
Anouk Aim√©e
Armando Brancia
Marcello Mastroianni 

Photography: Nicola Pecorini 
Music: Ludovico Einaudi 
Editing: Bruno Mattei, Elio Lamari, Daniele Campelli 
Genre: Documentary 
Year: 2004 
Country: Italy


00:00 Full Documentary
01:45 Insight into Federico Fellini's journey as a screenwriter, actor, and director, and the challenges faced during film screenings.
11:00 Insights into the making of La Dolce Vita and the collaboration with Federico Fellini.
19:18 Marcello Mastroianni recalls his experiences working with Federico Fellini in La Dolce Vita and The Nights of Cabiria.
26:22  Insight into the creative process and inspiration behind a character named 'The Sack Man' in Rome.
33:30 Insights on working with Federico Fellini and his unique approach to filmmaking.
42:08 Insight into Fellini's casting process and the unique characters he creates through collaboration with actors.
52:47  Insight into Fellini's filmmaking process and collaboration with actors, reflecting on the impact of television on storytelling.
56:21 Exploration of Donald Sutherland's unique experience working with Fellini on the film Casanova.
1:02:47 Exploration of the making of a film based on Casanova, with challenges and controversies faced by the director.
